resources.string: Login failed! This could happen due to Pokémon GO servers currently down!
Automatic nearby Pokémon locator. By enabling Pokémesh you will get notified if a Pokémon is near your current location.
PokéMesh doesn\'t have permission to use your location!
Whether to show or not the Pokémon on the Map
Whether to get notified whenever there are nearby Pokèmon
You need to enable PokéMesh settings before proceed!
No nearby Pokémon at the moment!
There are some Pokémon around you!
Display a fullscreen ad every 30 scans
Failed to communicate with update servers. Try again later!
You are running the last version of PokéMesh
PokéMesh is currently under update. Try back later
Pokémon GO servers are currently down. Try later
Failed to communicate with network provider. Try later!
©2016 PokéMesh\nPokémon and Pokémon character names are trademarks of Nintendo. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
Pokémon Trainers Club is currently down.\nTry again later!
Login to PTC is currently disabled!

To avoid downtime, from now on the app will connect through Google servers.
If your Pokémon GO account is connected trough Gmail, we recommend to use an alternative account, to avoid temporary or permanent ban.
If you don't have an alternative Gmail account, you can register one now.

Once the account is ready and registered, is now required to login through Pokémon GO and accept their ToS!
I already have an alternative Gmail account
Tap this button to point the marker on your position and start locating nearby Pokèmon
Long tap on the map to start a scan in the tapped position!
You are ready to use PokéMesh. Visit settings and the Pokèdex to discover all the features of the app. Enjoy the hunt!
Long tap on location icon to quickly launch Pokémon GO
Are you sure you want to disconnect this account?
Please, turn in \"Support us\" in settings in order to use this feature!
Use stock icons. A censor mask will be applied due to Nintendo\'s copyrights.

When relax mode is on, every time you close PokéMesh a background component will be started. A notification will indicate that is currently running. Relax mode will scan periodically your location and will notify you for nearby Pokémon!
Enable vibration for relax mode notifications.
The delay time between one scan and the next. More frequently scans can increase battery consumption and data usage.
Attention: tweaking these values will affect the time that each scan require to get completed.
Select the radius of the scan area by increasing or decreasing the steps from the selected/current location.
Select the distance in meters between the steps.
Display a marker for each scan step on the live map.
Something went wrong while taking the screenshot.
Developed by PokéMesh - Credits: PoGoAPI, Unknown6 Team
PokéMesh map is currently disabled. Follow us on Facebook for more updates.
Toggle the overlay map when PokéMesh is running in background
The user name is too short! Use at least 3 characters.
The chosen nick name contains invalid character.
Choose the position of the overlay map
Choose the size of the overlay map
The multi account system is an additional feature to increase the speed of the scan. They are different from the account used for login and they will only be used during the scan process.

In order to protect your data, we will not save your Google credentials. Insert an unique identifier to recognize the account you are going to add.\n\nNOTE: we can\'t prevent you from adding the same account multiple times. Adding the same accounts multiple times will break the scan functionality!
The identifier for this account is too short! Use at least 3 characters.
The chosen account identifier contains invalid character.
Do you want to remove the selected account?
Login failed with the account: %s. The account could be disabled or PokémonGO servers are currently down.
